title: New Tax Regime? Smarter Ways to Save
content: The new tax regime offers fewer deductions, but smart planning can still cut your tax. Here's how salaried and self-employed individuals can benefit.

title: NPS via Employer – A High-Impact Tax Saver
content:
• Up to 14% of basic salary contributed by employer is tax-free under Sec 80CCD(2)
• 60% of corpus is tax-free on withdrawal at age 60
• Helps build long-term retirement wealth

title: Boosting EPF Contributions for Safer Returns
content:
• Employees can voluntarily contribute 12% of actual basic salary
• Employer contributions remain tax-free
• Reliable, low-risk retirement planning option

title: Tax-Efficient Gifting to Parents
content:
• Gifts to non-earning parents can be invested in their names
• Income taxed in their slab (often lower or NIL)
• Clubbing provisions do not apply (unlike for spouse or minor children)

title: Section 44ADA Benefits for Consultants & Freelancers
content:
• Declare 50% of gross receipts as presumptive income
• No requirement to maintain books of accounts
• Applicable if receipts are up to ₹75 lakhs

title: Still-Allowed Deductions under New Regime
content:
• Interest on loan for let-out property (Sec 24b)
• Professional education/training expenses
• Select employer reimbursements remain exempt

title: CBDT Notifies Income Tax Return Forms for AY 2025-26
content: The Central Board of Direct Taxes (CBDT) has notified ITR-1 to ITR-7 for AY 2025-26, incorporating changes under the new tax regime.

title: GST Council Meeting – Key Takeaways from 53rd Session
content: The 53rd GST Council meeting addressed rate rationalization and issued clarifications on online gaming, food delivery, and insurance sectors.

title: RBI Hikes Repo Rate by 25 Basis Points
content: In an effort to control inflation, the RBI raised the repo rate to 6.75%, citing rising crude oil prices as a key pressure point.

title: SEBI Introduces New ESG Disclosure Norms for Listed Companies
content: SEBI has mandated quarterly ESG disclosures and enhanced board reporting standards, effective from Q3 FY2025.

title: MCA Extends LLP Form 11 Filing Deadline
content: The Ministry of Corporate Affairs (MCA) has extended the due date for LLP Form 11 filing to August 31, 2025.

title: Guide to Claiming Tax Deductions Under Old Regime (AY 2025-26)
content: Detailed breakdown of deductions under the old tax regime, including Sections 80C, 80D, 80CCD(1B), 24(b), and 80E. Emphasis on documentation and compliance for optimal tax benefit.
